pr_title: RM#26088 (RGPD global tracking project) GlobalTrackingConfigurationLine & data-init

timeline.author: ale-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -146,6 +148,12 @@
 "This app is used by %s. Please deactivate them before continue.","Cette application est utilisée par %s. Veuillez les désactiver avent de continuer",,
 "Title","Titre",,
 "To",,,
+"Track creation","Traçer la création",,
+"Track deletion","Traçer la suppression",,
+"Track export","Traçer l'export",,
+"Track reading","Traçer ma lecture",,

timeline.author: ale-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
+<object-views xmlns="http://axelor.com/xml/ns/object-views"
+  xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+  xsi:schemaLocation="http://axelor.com/xml/ns/object-views http://axelor.com/xml/ns/object-views/object-views_5.2.xsd">
+
+	<grid name="global-tracking-configuration-line-grid" title="Global tracking configuration lines" model="com.axelor.apps.admin.db.GlobalTrackingConfigurationLine" >
+			<field name="metaModel" />
+			<field name="metaField" />
+			<field name="trackCreation" />
+			<field name="trackDeletion" />
+			<field name="trackUpdate" />
+			<field name="trackExport" />
+			<field name="trackReading" />
+			<field name="trackingCondition" />
+	</grid>
+	
+
+	<form name="global-tracking-configuration-line-form"
+		title="Global tracking configuration line"
+		model="com.axelor.apps.admin.db.GlobalTrackingConfigurationLine"
+		width="large"
+		canAttach="false" >
+		
+		<panel name="global-tracking-configuration-line-panel" colSpan="12" >
+		
+			<field name="metaModel" title="Model" />
+			<field name="metaField" title="Field" showIf="metaModel != null" domain="self.metaModel = :metaModel" />
+			<field name="trackCreation" colSpan="2" widget="inline-checkbox" colOffset="1" />
+			<field name="trackDeletion" colSpan="2" widget="inline-checkbox" />
+			<field name="trackUpdate" colSpan="2" widget="inline-checkbox" />
+			<field name="trackExport" colSpan="2" widget="inline-checkbox" />
+			<field name="trackReading" colSpan="2" widget="inline-checkbox" />
+			<field name="trackingCondition" colSpan="12" widget="string"/>

timeline.message:
RM#26088 (RGPD global tracking project)

- Add new model GlobalTrackingConfigurationLine (GTCL) in axelor-admin to focus tracking on personal data
- Add GTCL basics form & grid
- Override GTCL model in axelor-base to add a relation M2O with AppBase
- Add O2M field in AppBase
- Add a new panel-tab for GTCL in app-base
- Add Franch (& English) translations for new features

- Add new model GlobalTrackingConfigurationLine (GTCL) in axelor-admin to focus tracking on personal data
- Add GTCL basics form & grid
- Override GTCL model in axelor-base to add a relation M2O with AppBase
- Add O2M field in AppBase
- Add a new panel-tab for GTCL in app-base
- Add French (& English) translations for new features
